Class EbEr

java.lang.Object
  EbEr
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class EbEr
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable

Class EbEr is designed to collect CODA Unix process information. This is our first attempt of creating DAQ expert system.

clear_info

public void clear_info()
Method is Intializing the instance variables from the DataPool.

status_info

public void status_info()
Method runs JavaDP and gets the status of the EB1 and ER1. It will try once. In case of undefined unswere he will sleep 7sec and try another time. If the status is steel undefined he will return the status.

info_collect

public void info_collect()
Method will read the EB1 and ER1 information and update local instance variables.

info_update

public void info_update()
Method will use local instance variables to update DataPool.

run method of the thread
